subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Shan Foster scored 32 points and No. 18 Vanderbilt knocked off No. 1 Tennessee, 72-69, on Tuesday night — a day after the Volunteers were voted No. 1 for the first time in team history.
snippet: Shan Foster scored 32 points and No. 18 Vanderbilt knocked off No. 1 Tennessee, 72-69, on Tuesday night — a day after the Volunteers were voted No. 1 for the first time in team history.
